sentences.en: A beam of light produced by a laser can weld metals.
sentences.cn: 激光器发生的光束可以焊接金属.

sentences.en: Affection of Arc - weld Inversion Power's Frequency on Weld Grain's Thinning.
sentences.cn: 逆变弧焊电源的频率对焊缝晶粒细化的影响.

sentences.en: All cracks were detected in regions where such manually made weld passes existed.
sentences.cn: 所以检查到的裂纹都位于有手工焊缝存在的区域.

sentences.en: It takes speed and skill to weld steel at this heat.
sentences.cn: 在这样的温度下焊钢需要速度和技术.

sentences.en: It takes speed to weld steel at this heat.
sentences.cn: 在这样的高温下熔接钢铁需要快速.

sentences.en: It's possible to weld stainless steel to ordinary steel.
sentences.cn: 不锈钢是有可能和普通钢焊接在一起的。

sentences.en: Our botanists try to find out where useful weld plants grow.
sentences.cn: 我们的植物工作者们设法找到有用的野生植物生长的地方.

sentences.en: Precision assembly, welding technology, weld design, testing and weld steel structure correction.
sentences.cn: 组装精度 、 焊接工艺 、 焊缝外型 、 探伤焊缝以及钢结构矫正.

sentences.en: The new handle will have to be welded on.
These alloys weld at different heats.
sentences.cn: 这些合金可在不同的温度[热度]熔接.

sentences.en: They weld the pieces of a broken axle.
They will also be used on factory floors to weld things together.
sentences.cn: 它们也可用于工厂车间，用来焊接物体。

sentences.en: This indicated that the fracture had initiated at the unfused butt weld in the longitudinal stiffener.
sentences.cn: 研究表明裂纹是从纵向加劲助未熔透的对接焊缝中起始的.

sentences.en: Threaded or butt - weld end valves may be quoted on application.
sentences.cn: 可以根据要求提供螺纹或对焊端口阀门的报价.

sentences.en: Where did you learn to weld?
sentences.cn: 你在哪儿学会的焊接技术？
